Why be part of of our Preferred Agent Program?

Download Preferred Agent Program information as a PDF

Download PDF

Benefits & Rewards

1

More savings! Enjoy better pricing!

With our programme, you’re entitled to skip past price points correspondingto your level.

2

Gain credit terms up to 45 Days

Give yourself extra time. Take advantage of our credit extention programme offered to our leveled. Preferred Agents.

3

Claim up to RM 500 worth of samples

Receive credit and claim samples at no additional charge! Credit value given correlates to your level and is issued yearly in January.

4

Free Delivery

Delivery is free for all orders above RM2000. The higher your level, the lower the minimum order required. Applicable for deliveries to Klang Valley area only.

Terms and Conditions apply.

How to determine your level

Delivery and credit terms are determined in an on-going basis, according to the last 12 months of your Total Sales Order. For sample credit, your total sales order is tabulated base on the annual year (Jan-Dec) and is granted on January.

Upon achieving a level and any further changes of your level, you will receive an automatic e-mail notification. Alternatively, you may call your sales representative to check with.

Levels Total Sales Order
(last 12 months)
RM10,000
RM25,000
RM40,000
RM60,000
RM80,000

Levels allow you to skip price points according to your level

A level 1 agent skips 1 price point for the purchase of 10 pacrossuct pieces , whereas an agent at level 4 skips 4 points from the original price point.
